task.title: Copying and pasting text in the structure panel
task.shortdesc: This is how users can copy and paste text into CWRC-Writer by selecting a tag in the structure panel.

copyright.copyrholder: Use of this public-domain resource is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License

step.cmd: Copy the information that you would like to paste into CWRC-Writer.
Double click on the tag you wish to paste into in the structure panel until it is bolded and italicized.

info.note: If you use this method, you will delete all content currently in the tag that you are pasting into.

step.cmd: With the tag you selected highlighted, use your keyboard shortcut to paste in the copied text.
